action.name: A
action.includeFlowNamePatternList: GT LOCKED,GT SETTINGS,GT AUTOCLICK,Switch On Off,RANDOM GT

action.name: Control UI: GTRANDOM = random(3,7); GT = getBoundsById("com.linecorp.lineman.driver:id/item_work_take_order_button"); GTXS = GT[0]; GTXST = GT[0] + GT[2]; GTYS = GT[1]; GTYST = GT[1]+ GT[3]; GTMODIFX = random(GTXS,GTXST); GTMODIFY = random(GTYS,GTYST); touchGesture(0,GTRANDOM,newList(GTMODIFX,GTMODIFY));

Control UI: Number_Cutting = length(findAll(global_GT_LINE_CUT, ",")​)​+1; Store_Name =split(toLowerCase(replaceAll(global_GT_LINE_CUT, " ", "")), ",")​; i = 0; check_store = getTextByIdAndIndex("com.linecorp.lineman.driver:id/item_work_delivery_starting_location_name", 0); for(i in [ i to Number_Cutting]) { if

action.name: RANDOMGT
Script: global_credit_price = value;
Script: global_end_price = toNumber(value)​;
Script: global_GT_LINE_CUT = gtline; check_store = length(findAll(global_GT_LINE_CUT, ","))​+1;
Script: global_start_price = toNumber(value)​; if(global_type_food == 1) setting_type = "ส่งอาหาร" else setting_type = "ทุกงาน"
Script: global_tile = 1
Script: global_tile = 2
Script: if(value == "ล๊อคร้าน") global_request_type = 1 else global_request_type = 2
Script: if(value == "ส่งอาหาร") global_type_food = 1 else global_type_food = 2
Set Flow State: Disable GT AUTOCLICK
Set Flow State: Enable GT SETTINGS,GT LOCKED,GT AUTOCLICK,Switch On Off,RANDOM GT
